hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select ta.ID_,ta.menuName,IFNULL(tb.roleId,0) as roleId from core_leftmenu ta left join core_leftmenu_role_relation tb on tb.menuId = ta.ID_ and tb.roleId = :relationId where ta.parentId = :parentId order by ta.parentId,ta.sequence
delete from core_leftmenu_role_relation where menuId = :menuId and roleId = :roleId
select count(*) as ds from core_leftmenu_role_relation where menuId = :menuId and roleId = :roleId

SELECT ta.opName,tb.roleId FROM core_leftmenu ta left join core_leftmenu_role_relation tb on tb.menuId = ta.ID_ and tb.roleId in (select tc.roleId from core_role_user_relation tc where tc.userId = :userId)
